import React from 'react'; const About = () => { return (

Who are we

We Produce shows with the intent to entertain and spark conversations amongst the youth. We also offer rental services, specifically for young creative artists, to aid them in effectively executing and delivering their craft. HwanKreativez aims to be a hub which births the most unexpecting or intriguing collaborations amongst the young creatives in an attempt to build a platform for such artists to promote their craft to a youthful audience.

About Us

HwanKreativez production enables us create advertisement contents, market products and services who's target include the youth, our entertainment articles recommend brands that any youth should know about and have a seasoned release of products that many will rush to have their first grab.

More of Us

HwanKreativez has a non-profit foundation, known as HwanWorld. As Cliche as it may sound, HwanWorld dedicates itself to building a community, a safe space, a world; whereby life is less painful, the neglected will be reminded that they matter, the hopeless find hope, the outcast feel welcomed with each act of love you experience or witness. HwanWorld aids the less fortunate, rewards the kind-hearted and promotes wholesome content which exhibits acts of love. Do ou know someone, a situation or an occurrence that fits a part of this description? Feel free to chat with us!

Why Us

A platform which dedicates itself to aiding, promoting and help delivering one's artistry regardless of how chaotic, uncommon or absurd it may first appear to one's mind. A platform that makes it a mission to increase your chance and succesfully delivering your craft and penetrating a very competitve media and entertainment industry, if you are a youthful creative artist the question you should askis why not us? What have I got to lose? Give it a shot, take a risk and be creative with it.

); }; export default About;
